Launched, led, or actively participated in an organization that increased the capacity of the financial community in this way to address climate change through activity. Launched, led, or actively participated in an organization that encouraged corporation in this way to respond to concerns about climate change through activity. Launched, led, or actively participated in an organization that encouraged government or regulatory body to establish policy that facilitates increased or improved investments in solutions to climate change or that discourages investments that perpetuate climate change.
